title: Part A
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned for implicit differentiation

1 point is earned for verification

2x+2+4 y 3 dy dx +4 dt dx =0 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@47F2@

(4 y 3 +4) dy dx =−2x−2 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@44CF@

dy dx = −2(x+1) 4( y 3 +1) = −(x+1) 2( y 3 +1) MathType@MTEF@5@5@@51C3@
descriptions:
The student response earns none of the following points:

1 point is earned for implicit differentiation

1 point is earned for verification

2x+2+4 y 3 dy dx +4 dt dx =0 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@47F2@

(4 y 3 +4) dy dx =−2x−2 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@44CF@

dy dx = −2(x+1) 4( y 3 +1) = −(x+1) 2( y 3 +1) MathType@MTEF@5@5@@51C3@

The student response earns one of the following points:

1 point is earned for implicit differentiation

1 point is earned for verification

dy dx = −2(x+1) 4( y 3 +1) = −(x+1) 2( y 3 +1) MathType@MTEF@5@5@@51C3@

(4 y 3 +4) dy dx =−2x−2 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@44CF@

dy dx = −2(x+1) 4( y 3 +1) = −(x+1) 2( y 3 +1) MathType@MTEF@5@5@@51C3@

The student response earns all of the following points:

1 point is earned for implicit differentiation

1 point is earned for verification

2x+2+4 y 3 dy dx +4 dt dx =0 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@47F2@

(4 y 3 +4) dy dx =−2x−2 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@44CF@

dy dx = −2(x+1) 4( y 3 +1) = −(x+1) 2( y 3 +1) MathType@MTEF@5@5@@51C3@
